output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present in the post.
2. Refers to candidates: - Yes, directly mentions multiple presidential candidates: * Elena Lasconi (USR) * George Simion (AUR) * CÄƒlin Georgescu (Independent)
3. Addresses wide population: - Yes, it's a paid advertisement with 300,000-350,000 impressions - Targeting multiple regions across Romania - Published on both Facebook and Instagram - Significant spend (600-699 RON)
4. Electoral objective: - Clear electoral intent by: * Discussing candidate support/opposition * Highlighting political alignments * Promoting specific candidates' values * Attempting to influence voter perception
5. Journalism: - While presented as news, it goes beyond objective reporting - Shows clear bias in presentation - Focus on political alignment rather than factual reporting

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Directly promotes/disparages specific presidential candidates - Uses paid distribution to reach wide audience - Published during restricted period - Goes beyond journalistic reporting - Clear attempt to influence voter preference
conclusion.message-for-police: Comentatorii.RO, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unui material de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 8744995008916796) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul promovat, cu o audienta de peste 300.000 de persoane si un buget de aproximativ 650 RON, prezinta in mod explicit sustinerea unui candidat (George Simion) si discreditarea altui candidat (Elena Lasconi), reprezentand propaganda electorala activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Impactul este amplificat prin distributia pe multiple platforme (Facebook si Instagram) si targetarea nationala, constituind o incalcare clara a prevederilor legale privind perioada de campanie electorala.
